
```{r}
head(beer)
```
```{r}
#plot data
autoplot(beer)
```

```{r}
#simple exponential smoothing using alpha at .1, .5 and .9
#which one has the lowest RMSE, h is the lag and c is confidence interval -80 or 95
beer1 <- ses(beer,h=25, level = c(80,95), alpha = .1)
summary(beer1)
autoplot(beer1)


```

```{r}
beer2 <- ses(beer,h=25, level = c(80,95), alpha = .5)
summary(beer2)
autoplot(beer2)
```

```{r}
beer3 <- ses(beer,h=25, level = c(80,95), alpha = .10)
summary(beer3)
autoplot(beer3)
```
